Name: Return to Planet X
About the game: Return to Planet X is a close combat FPS in which you will have to smash tons of alien bugs and shoot your way through the secret millitary base located on a distant planet. Our game takes the inspiration in action FPS games like Doom or Half-Life and novels like Starship Troopers. Key Features Laser guns, grenades, explosives and flamethrower Alien bugs Explore a world cloaked in mystery and danger Stunning environments with moody graphics
